key_risks: Regulatory and compliance risks, particularly anti-money laundering (AML) and consumer protection regulations
Interest rate sensitivity impacting net interest margins (NIM)
Integration risks from recent acquisitions like Bank Leumi USA
Competitive pressures from traditional banks and fintech companies
controversies: Legal challenges such as the Anthony V. Ottilio foreclosure case
Community opposition to mergers due to concerns about reduced access to banking services for low-to-moderate income (LMI) communities
social_issues: Concerns about reduced access to banking services for low-to-moderate income (LMI) communities
governance_issues: Regulatory scrutiny and potential compliance lapses
